price: 1 Alif-Lâm-Râ. Voici les versets du Livre révélés sous forme d’une lecture parfaitement claire[681].
arabic: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi waqur'ānin mubīnin
